content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Greetings Nesibe, I'm glad you could make it to see the apartment. I understand that you're looking for a place to rent and I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a monthly rental price of 1500 Euros would be fair. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1300 Euros.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Very well, Nesibe. I agree to the price of 1300 Euros per month for the rental of the apartment. I believe this is a fair price based on the size and location of the apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a few questions. First, can I have the keys to the apartment on the day of move in? Second, is there a security deposit required? Third, is there any additional fee for utilities or maintenance?

Also, I would like to terminate the lease if I need to move out before the end of the lease term. Can you provide me with a termination notice form?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Of course, Nesibe. I can provide you with the keys to the apartment on the day of move-in. As for the security deposit, I do require one. The amount of the security deposit will be 250 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the lease agreement.

As for additional fees, there will be a monthly fee of 50 Euros for utilities, including electricity, water, and gas. This fee will be due on the first day of each month. If you require any maintenance or repairs, there will be an additional fee of 100 Euros per incident.

Regarding the termination of the lease, I can provide you with a termination notice form. However, I would like to clarify that if you terminate the lease before the end of the lease term, you will be responsible for paying the rent for the remaining months of the lease term. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
